message.body: Mimi had extra money. Cut a check for each of u for five hundred
Wow...the associate director of financial services also gave me very incorrect information on the phone once she called me to correct her mistake

On friday she told me to email her what kind of loan i wanted and how much i wanted to take out, she suggested i take a subsidized loan which the gov website says im not eligible for as a grad student, i even reminded her that im a grad student...
